title: Howard Stern - August 12, 2014 [ALL-VERSIONS]
description:
Howard Stern - August 12, 2014

* Howard's Long Day And More. 6:00am
* Robin Williams Discussions. 6:10am
* Eric The Actor Vs. Gonzo. 6:25am
* Phone Calls, Wendy The Retard Voicemails And More. 6:55am
* Porn Star Adriana Chechik Visits. 7:20am
* Howard Paints Tom Petty. 8:25am
* The Nicole Bass Either-Or Game. 8:35am
* Various Bits, Phone Calls And More. 8:55am
* Robin's News. 9:20am
* Wrap Up Show - Robin Williams. 10:25am
* Wrap Up Show - Staff Weight. 10:30am
* Wrap Up Show - Adriana Chechik. 10:45am
* Wrap Up Show - Sal Fell Off The Porn Wagon. 11:00am

This includes an audio edit using @SternGeek's source.

1) This audio has been dyson compressed at 80% and amplified for maximum range.
Talk Radio & Podcasts sound much better, especially thru earbuds, with this edit.
You will also find it easier to hear audio details in loud environments.
If you have good speakers, or listen in a quite environment, you don't need this.

2) This encode will also use much less power from your batteries.

3) I have been experimenting lately with mixing in a small amount of white noise
in the final rendering to get rid of those awkward silences that the MP3 format
sometimes creates when there's not enough volume to compress. So far I like it.
